name: OR_CASE_POS_DEVS
description: The OR_CASE_POS_DEVS table contains the positioning devices information for the current case.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: POS_DEV_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The positioning device type category number for the case record.

columns.name: POS_DEV_REQ_YN_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether a positioning device will be required for the case. Y indicates that the device will be required for the case. N indicates that the device will not be required. Null indicates that there is no value configured for the case.

columns.name: POS_DEV_START_TM
columns.description: The time when the positioning device was started for the case.

columns.name: POS_DEV_END_TM
columns.description: The time when the positioning device was ended for the case.

columns.name: POS_DEV_PANEL_NUM
columns.description: The panel numbers of the case in which the positioning device is used. This is a caret-delimited string of panel numbers.

columns.name: POS_DEV_DEFAULT_YN_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether a positioning device will default from the case. Y indicates that the device will default from the case. N indicates that the device will not default from the case. Null indicates that there is no value configured for the case.

columns.name: POS_DEV_BODYPART_C_NAME
columns.description: The body part type category number for the case record.
